npcs.name: Mirror Monk
npcs.description: Robed figure whose skin shimmers with embedded glass

dialogue.text: Your skin refracts. The angle has chosen you.
Light burns in your veins. You carry the storm's fire.
The storm speaks through your flesh. Listen.
You walk unmarked. The storm has not yet spoken to you.

npcs.name: Sand-Engineer
npcs.description: Weathered mechanic with goggles and tool-laden belt

dialogue.text: Saltblood, eh? Useful. Glass won't cut you.
Adapted, I see. Stay useful, stay alive.
Fresh meat. Watch where you step—glass cuts deep.

npcs.name: Glassborn
npcs.description: Humanoid form of fused glass and crystallized flesh

dialogue.text: You begin to understand. The shimmer is not pain—it is becoming.
You flinch at the shimmer. We were born in it.
Unmarked flesh. The storm will teach you, or break you.
